text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org version 2.7
    CodeDisplay
    21198-7Choriogonadotropin.beta subunit [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    20415-6Choriogonadotropin.beta subunit [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay (EIA) 3rd IS
    55869-2Choriogonadotropin.beta subunit [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    23841-0Choriogonadotropin.beta subunit [Multiple of the median] adjusted in Serum or Plasma
    2111-3Choriogonadotropin.beta subunit [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    55868-4Choriogonadotropin.beta subunit [Multiple of the median] in Serum or Plasma
  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.mdanderson.org/oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.412.2.7.5.737384.134 version 1
    CodeDisplay
    5080Beta HCG, Pregnancy

name: BetaHCG
title: Beta HCG
description: LOINC codes indicating Beta HCG measurement Adding proprietary MDA codes
